name: Iso Islands
description:
Welcome to Iso Islands!

In this game, you are stranded on an island with the only chance of escape being your ship. The problem is, your ship is in dire need of repair. So it is your job to repair your ship and make your way off this forlorn land and venture to new lands.

How do you do this, you ask? By chopping trees, breaking down mountains, mining for coal, and a lot more.

Cheers
